EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different - Live Different Build Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi _______,
To volunteer with Live Different on any of our Live Different Build trips on your own, you must be over the age of 14. All of the project fees, accommodations, meals and travel costs must be fundraised by every volunteer.
Who: Any volunteer can join a trip! (minimum 14 years of age to sign up without a parent guardian)
What: A trip for groups of volunteers who want to make a difference internationally!
When: All year round you can book a private trip with you and your friends (minimum of 10 people) or we have public trips that anyone can sign up for during the summer and holidays!
Where: Dominican Republic, Mexico, Thailand and Haiti
Why: We are all about choice - the choice to live different.
We believe in the value of each of our lives, and that value is what makes our lives worth living.
Upcoming Trips: The trips are all different when it comes to length and projects. Please click on this link to see a list of trips that we have available and see which one works best for you: http://livedifferent.com/hero-holiday
Experience what a trip might look like for you: Here is a video of one of our trips happening in Haiti: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cC7_iEk97I
Photos and Videos: Here are some photos and videos from our past Live Different Build trips if you would like to use them for your fundraising needs: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3wke2n7mm37rg7e/E0VsZOT3q8
Other Important Information: Check out our Live Different Facebook page! There are photos, blogs and videos from our most recent trips, it's a great resource to help you prepare for your trip: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Live-Different/189864944417296.
You can also visit our FAQ section on our website as it is a great resource. http://www.livedifferent.com/faqs
Please e-mail me back with more questions or concerns you may have. I look forward to answering them for you!
If you have any more questions, please let me know!
